# Client SDK Documentation Map

## Core
- [INDEX.md](INDEX.md): MANDATORY READ. Concepts, architecture, and dependency relationships. Start here.
- [quickstart.md](quickstart.md): Copy-pastable boilerplate code.

## API & Class Signatures
- [api/client.md](api/client.md): READ for `Client` constructor options, request methods, and connection management.
- [api/transports.md](api/transports.md): READ for `StreamableHTTPClientTransport` (Client HTTP), `StdioClientTransport`, and `SSEClientTransport` (Legacy) information.

## Feature Consumption
- [capabilities/tools.md](capabilities/tools.md): READ for listing and calling tools.
- [capabilities/resources.md](capabilities/resources.md): READ for listing, reading, and subscribing to resources.
- [capabilities/prompts.md](capabilities/prompts.md): READ for listing and retrieving prompts.
- [capabilities/sampling.md](capabilities/sampling.md): READ for handling sampling requests from the server (if building an agent).
- [capabilities/roots.md](capabilities/roots.md): READ for exposing filesystem roots to the server.

## Patterns
- [patterns/host-application.md](patterns/host-application.md): READ for integrating the client into a larger application (Host).
- [docs/client-sdk/types.md](docs/client-sdk/types.md): REFERENCE. TypeScript definitions for Client, Transports, and Capabilities.
